title: World’s Longest-Serving Central Bank Chief to Get New Term in Romania
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Romania’s Mugur Isarescu, the world’s longest-serving central bank governor, is poised to be confirmed for a new five-year term as lawmakers seek a vote on the extension by the end of June.

Isarescu took over the leadership of the National Bank of Romania in 1990, less than a year af...
